cause.description:
Fans, Wrestlers, and Family Members of Wrestlers striving to end the sickness in Professional Wrestling.
1. No reason for a Wrestler to die before 45
2. Stop the abuse of drugs, alcohol, and steroids
3. Supoort the families that have been effected
cause.mission: Stop the Deaths of young Wrestlers, and give support to drug/alcohol/steroid users.
cause.name: Wrestling with Death...as Real as "Fake" can get!
